mapper.insert: insert into WM_LOGS (ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, DESCRIPTION, FLAGID, IPADDRESS, NAME, OLDCONTENT, OPTCONTENT, PARAMS, REALNAME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updaterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flagid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update WM_LOGS set CREATORID = #{creatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATERID = #{updaterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAGID = #{flagid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IPADDRESS = #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLDCONTENT = #{oldcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTCONTENT = #{optcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAMS = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, DESCRIPTION, FLAGID, IPADDRESS, NAME, OLDCONTENT, OPTCONTENT, PARAMS, REALNAME from WM_LOGS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, CREATORID, CREATOR, CREATETIME, UPDATERID, UPDATER, UPDATETIME, DESCRIPTION, FLAGID, IPADDRESS, NAME, OLDCONTENT, OPTCONTENT, PARAMS, REALNAME from WM_LOGS order by updateTime desc,updater asc
